```{r, data, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
class_roll0822 <- readRDS("./class_roll0822.RDS")

nrow(class_roll0822)
class_roll <- read_excel("../data/class_roll230901.xlsx",

                         col_names = TRUE,

nrow(class_roll)
names(class_roll) <- 
  c("college", "dept", "year", "id", "name", "status", "email", "cell_no")

  ifelse(is.na(class_roll$status), "휴학", class_roll$status)
```

### 8월 22일자 출석부에만 나오는 사람들의 분포

```{r, echo = FALSE}
id_out <- setdiff(class_roll0822$id, class_roll$id)
id_new <- setdiff(class_roll$id, class_roll0822$id)
N_new <- length(id_new)
id_stay <- setdiff(class_roll0822$id, id_out)
class_roll0822[class_roll0822$id %in% id_out, c("id", "group")] %>%
  pander
class_roll0822$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0822$id %in% id_out) %>%
  table %>%
  pander
N_stay <- class_roll0822$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0822$id %in% id_stay) %>%
  length
red_stay <- class_roll0822$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0822$id %in% id_stay) %>%
  table %>%
  `[`(1) %>%
  unname
N <- nrow(class_roll)
red_new <- floor((N - 2 * red_stay) / 2)
```

### 100만번씩 10회 반복한 결과를 

```{r, sub randomization, echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
source("./RnB_v4_2023.R")
M1 <- 1
M2 <- 100000
Xsum <- sapply(M1:M2, red_and_black)
names(Xsum) <- M1:M2
Xsum %>%
  summary %>%
  round(2) 
Xsum %>%
  sd %>%
  round(2)
Xsum %>%
  `<=`(3) %>%
  which %>%
  `[`(Xsum, .) %>%
  round(2)
Xmin <- names(Xsum[which(Xsum == min(Xsum))])
Xmin
```

## Randomization

```{r, randomization}
Xmin <- 9028589
set.seed(Xmin)
id_red <- sample(1:N_new, size = red_new)
class_roll[class_roll$id %in% id_new, "group"] <- 
  factor(ifelse(1:N_new %in% id_red, "Red", "Black"), levels = c("Red", "Black")) 
class_roll[order(class_roll$name), c("id", "group")]
```

### 학번

```{r, id, echo = FALSE}
class_roll$id_2 <-
  class_roll$id %>%
  ifelse(. <= 2017, "2017", .)
tbl1 <- class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id_2 %>% substr(1, 4)) %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("2017 이전", 2018:2023)) 
tbl1 %>%
  pander
class_roll <- class_roll[, names(class_roll0822)]
tbl1 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  pander
```

### 학번 홀짝

```{r, odd or even, echo = FALSE}
tbl2 <- class_roll$id %>%
  as.numeric %>%
  `%%`(2) %>%
  factor(levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("홀", "짝")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl2 %>%
  pander
tbl2 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  pander
```

### e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail, echo = FALSE}
isp <- class_roll$email %>%
    strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
    sapply("[", 2) %>%
    strsplit("[.]", fixed = FALSE) %>%
    sapply("[", 1)
tbl4 <- isp %>%
    `%in%`(c("naver", "gmail")) %>%
    ifelse(isp, "기타서비스") %>%
    factor(levels = c("naver", "gmail", "기타서비스"),
           labels = c("네이버", "구글", "기타서비스")) %>%
    table(class_roll$group, .)  
tbl4 %>%
  pander
tbl4 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  pander
```

### 전화번호의 분포

```{r, cell_no, echo = FALSE}
cut_label <- paste(paste0(0:9, "000"), paste0(0:9, "999"), 
                   sep = "~")
tbl5 <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 8, stop = 11) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric) %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl5 %>%
  pander
tbl5 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  pander
```
